title: Rav Markowitz Addresses Talmidim
body: Rav Shmuel Markowitz rallied Ponovezh Yeshiva talmidim after an arbitration ruling favoring his brother-in-law Rav Leizer Kahaneman, declaring "The Yeshiva Is Ruchniyus, And Ruchniyus Cannot Be Taken Away".

title: Extremists Confront MK Azoulay
body: Extremists in Ashdod stormed Shas MK Yinon Azoulay's home, accusing him of being a "traitor" over the giyus debate. The confrontation highlights tensions surrounding legislative developments tied to the issue.
